# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[I]], [[me]]
#: {{zh-x|你 共 '''恁爸''' 講 予 伊 清楚。|You say it to me clearly.|MN}}

===Usage notes===
* This word literally means ''your father'', but is used in a derogatory or a joking manner, or in an angry state, to mean "I" (myself).
